item.title: My Aeron Chair
item.description: A good ergonomic chair is a wise investment if you’re going to spend a lot of time at your computer. One of the better known ergonomic models is the Herman Miller Aeron Task Chair. What Other People Say About the Aeron Jeff Atwood (from Coding Horror) says: In fact, after browsing chairs for the last few years of my career, I’ve come to one conclusion: you can’t expect to get a decent chair for less than $500.
